task_background: Prepare the Temporal Genetics Lab for an urgent forensic analysis by organizing equipment, securing samples, and ensuring all systems are operational.

tasks.task_description: Place the calibration_laser_1 on the slide_scanner_1.
Find the heaviest, metal object in the sample_prep_annex and place it in the cold_storage_vault.
Use the wrench_1 to assemble the robotic_arm_1.
Use the lab_coat_1 to assemble the manual_release_wheel_1 on the contamination_chamber_1.
